source:
%%pyspark
# Imporing the libraries
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import lit,col,sum,mean,regexp_replace,to_date,count,row_number,unix_timestamp,date_format,quarter,expr,weekofyear,concat
from pyspark.sql.types import DateType,TimestampType
from pyspark.sql.window import Window

# Setting the flag to handle the date formats
spark.sql("set spark.sql.legacy.timeParserPolicy=LEGACY")

# Creating a spark session and connection to blob storage account
blob_account_name = "rawdevstorage"
blob_container_name = "output"
sc = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
token_library = sc._jvm.com.microsoft.azure.synapse.tokenlibrary.TokenLibrary
blob_sas_token = token_library.getConnectionString("cmdevsynapse-WorkspaceDefaultStorage")
spark.conf.set(
    'fs.azure.sas.%s.%s.blob.core.windows.net' % (blob_container_name, blob_account_name),
    blob_sas_token)

# Define the path to the Delta table
delta_table_path = 'abfss://output@rawdevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Electricity_Measurement_sparksql_join'

# Read Delta table into a DataFrame
reference_table = spark.read.format("delta").load(delta_table_path)
# Create a temporary view: To run SQL queries on a PySpark DataFrame, you need to create a temporary view using the createOrReplaceTempView method.

# Reading the geo location file
geo_location = spark.read.csv("abfss://output@rawdevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/geo_postcode.csv", header=True, inferSchema=True)

# Create a temporary view: To run SQL queries on a PySpark DataFrame, you need to create a temporary view using the createOrReplaceTempView method.
geo_location.createOrReplaceTempView("geo_location")

# Reading the date file
date = spark.read.csv("abfss://output@rawdevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/time_dimension.csv", header=True, inferSchema=True)

date = date.filter(col("datum") >= "2002-01-01")

# Create a temporary view: To run SQL queries on a PySpark DataFrame, you need to create a temporary view using the createOrReplaceTempView method.
date.createOrReplaceTempView("date")

%%sql
with cte_group as (
SELECT Markt, COUNT(1) as CAST
FROM reference_table
WHERE Markt IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY Markt
)
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Markt) AS Markt_ID
,Markt
FROM cte_group

query = 'with cte_group as (\
SELECT Markt, COUNT(1) as CAST\
 FROM reference_table\
 WHERE Markt IS NOT NULL\
 GROUP BY Markt\
)\
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Markt) AS Markt_ID\
,Markt\
 FROM cte_group'

markt_dimension = spark.sql(query)
markt_dimension.createOrReplaceTempView("markt_dimension")
display(markt_dimension.limit(5))

# Writing the markt dimension to delta file
file_path = 'abfss://goldlayer@rawdevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/SparkSQLDimensions/Markt_Dimension'
write_format="delta"
#partition_by=["DM_Peildatum"]
mode_ = "overwrite" #append

markt_dimension\
.write\
.option("header", "true")\
.option("overwriteSchema", "true")\
.format(write_format)\
.mode(mode_)\
.save(file_path)

#.partitionBy(partition_by)\

%%sql
with cte_group as (
SELECT Leveringsadres_Postcode, Leveringsadres_Gemeente, COUNT(1) as CAST
 FROM reference_table
 WHERE Leveringsadres_Postcode IS NOT NULL AND Leveringsadres_Gemeente IS NOT NULL
 GROUP BY Leveringsadres_Postcode, Leveringsadres_Gemeente
)
SELECT dwh_id as Geo_ID
,Leveringsadres_Postcode
,Leveringsadres_Gemeente
,gewest
,provincie
 FROM cte_group cg
 JOIN geo_location g on cg.Leveringsadres_Postcode=g.postcode
 LIMIT 5

query = 'with cte_group as (\
SELECT Leveringsadres_Postcode, Leveringsadres_Gemeente, COUNT(1) as CAST\
 FROM reference_table\
 WHERE Leveringsadres_Postcode IS NOT NULL AND Leveringsadres_Gemeente IS NOT NULL\
 GROUP BY Leveringsadres_Postcode, Leveringsadres_Gemeente\
)\
SELECT dwh_id as Geo_ID\
,Leveringsadres_Postcode\
,Leveringsadres_Gemeente\
,gewest\
,provincie\
 FROM cte_group cg\
 JOIN geo_location g on cg.Leveringsadres_Postcode=g.postcode'

 
geo_location_dimension = spark.sql(query)
geo_location_dimension.createOrReplaceTempView("geo_location_dimension")
display(geo_location_dimension.limit(5))

# Writing the geo location dimension to delta file
file_path = 'abfss://goldlayer@rawdevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/SparkSQLDimensions/Geo_Location_Dimension'
write_format="delta"
#partition_by=["DM_Peildatum"]
mode_ = "overwrite" #append

geo_location_dimension\
.write\
.option("header", "true")\
.option("overwriteSchema", "true")\
.format(write_format)\
.mode(mode_)\
.save(file_path)

#.partitionBy(partition_by)\

# Creating a group by for date dimensions
grouped_reference_table_date_dimension = reference_table.groupBy("Trekkingsdatum")
date_dimension_1 = grouped_reference_table_date_dimension.agg(count("Trekkingsdatum"))
grouped_reference_table_date_dimension = reference_table.groupBy("Peildatum")
date_dimension_2 = grouped_reference_table_date_dimension.agg(count("Trekkingsdatum"))
date_dimension = date_dimension_1.union(date_dimension_2).distinct()

# Renaming the date location column
date_dimension = date_dimension.withColumnRenamed("Trekkingsdatum", "Date_Standard")

# Exclude the undefined/null value
date_dimension = date_dimension.filter(col("Date_Standard").isNotNull())

# Define the window specification for the grouping
#date_dimension_window_spec = Window.orderBy(date_dimension["Date_Standard"].desc())

# Add an auto-incrementing column to the DataFrame within the group
#date_dimension = date_dimension.withColumn("Date_ID", row_number().over(date_dimension_window_spec))

# Add new column
date_dimension = date_dimension.withColumn("Date", concat(expr("substring(Date_Standard, 1, 4)"), expr("substring(Date_Standard, 6, 2)"), expr("substring(Date_Standard, 9, 2)")))

# date_dimension = date_dimension.withColumn("Day", date_format(date_dimension["Date"], "d").cast("integer"))
# date_dimension = date_dimension.withColumn("Month", date_format(date_dimension["Date"], "M").cast("integer"))
# date_dimension = date_dimension.withColumn("Year", date_format(date_dimension["Date"], "y").cast("integer"))
# date_dimension = date_dimension.withColumn("Quarter", quarter(date_dimension["Date"]))
# date_dimension = date_dimension.withColumn("Day_Of_Year", expr("dayofyear(Date)"))
# date_dimension = date_dimension.withColumn("Week_Number", weekofyear(date_dimension["Date"]))

# joinigng the dataframe to get all the column for geo location dimension
date_dimension = date_dimension.join(date, date["datum"] == date_dimension["Date_Standard"], "inner")

# Selecting specific columns
date_dimension = date_dimension.select('date_ID','Date','Date_Standard','dag_naam','maand_naam','jaar','kwartaal')

# Displaying top 5 rows
display(date_dimension.limit(5))

# Writing the date dimension to delta file
file_path = 'abfss://goldlayer@rawdevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/PySparkDimensions/Date_Dimension'
write_format="delta"
#partition_by=["DM_Peildatum"]
mode_ = "overwrite" #append

date_dimension\
.write\
.option("header", "true")\
.option("overwriteSchema", "true")\
.format(write_format)\
.mode(mode_)\
.save(file_path)

#.partitionBy(partition_by)\

# Create a Fact delta_table_path by joining the reference table with dimensions
fact_table = reference_table.join(geo_location_dimension, reference_table["Leveringsadres_Postcode"] == geo_location_dimension["Leveringsadres_Postcode"], "inner")
fact_table = fact_table.join(markt_dimension, fact_table["Markt"] == markt_dimension["Markt"], "inner")
fact_table = fact_table.join(date_dimension, fact_table["Peildatum"] == date_dimension["Date_Standard"], "inner")

# Renaming the date column
fact_table = fact_table.withColumnRenamed("Date_ID", "Peildatum_ID") 

# Selecting Specific columns
fact_table = fact_table.select('Trekkingsdatum',
 'Peildatum_ID',
 'Markt_ID',
 'Geo_ID',
 'WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2017',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2017',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2017_Norm',
 'AantalToegangspunten_2017',
 'WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2018',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2018',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2018_Norm',
 'AantalToegangspunten_2018',
 'WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2019',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2019',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2019_Norm',
 'AantalToegangspunten_2019',
 'WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2020',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2020',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2020_Norm',
 'AantalToegangspunten_2020',
 'WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2021',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2021',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2021_Norm',
 'AantalToegangspunten_2021',
 'Gemiddeld_WerkelijkVerbruik',
 'Gemiddeld_BenaderendVerbruik',
 'Gemiddeld_BenaderendVerbruik_Norm',
 'Total_AantalToegangspunten')

# Creating Trekkingsdatum_ID
fact_table = fact_table.join(date_dimension, fact_table["Trekkingsdatum"] == date_dimension["Date_Standard"], "inner")

# Renaming the date column
fact_table = fact_table.withColumnRenamed("Date_ID", "Trekkingsdatum_ID") 

# Selecting Specific columns
fact_table = fact_table.select('Trekkingsdatum_ID',
 'Peildatum_ID',
 'Markt_ID',
 'Geo_ID',
 'WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2017',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2017',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2017_Norm',
 'AantalToegangspunten_2017',
 'WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2018',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2018',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2018_Norm',
 'AantalToegangspunten_2018',
 'WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2019',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2019',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2019_Norm',
 'AantalToegangspunten_2019',
 'WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2020',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2020',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2020_Norm',
 'AantalToegangspunten_2020',
 'WerkelijkVerbruik_RM_2021',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2021',
 'BenaderendVerbruik_VM_2021_Norm',
 'AantalToegangspunten_2021',
 'Gemiddeld_WerkelijkVerbruik',
 'Gemiddeld_BenaderendVerbruik',
 'Gemiddeld_BenaderendVerbruik_Norm',
'Total_AantalToegangspunten')


display(fact_table.limit(5))

# Writing the fact table to delta file
file_path = 'abfss://goldlayer@rawdevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/PySparkDimensions/Fact_Table'
write_format="delta"
#partition_by=["DM_Peildatum"]
mode_ = "overwrite" #append

fact_table\
.write\
.option("header", "true")\
.option("overwriteSchema", "true")\
.format(write_format)\
.mode(mode_)\
.save(file_path)

#.partitionBy(partition_by)\
